name: ThenPCIInfoIsNotDisplayedOnFAQPage
description: Verify that info related to PCI is not displayed on FAQ page
aliases: Then verify that information related to PCI is not displayed on FAQ page
children: When I click on element FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdownModule
Then FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdownModule.DropdownBoxModule.DropdownContentBox.ListElement[filterType='text',filterValue='PROGRAMMA PROTECTION PLUS'] is not displayed
Then FAQSectionModule.TopicsDropdownModule.DropdownBoxModule.DropdownContentBox.ListElement[filterType='text',filterValue='STANDARD PCI - DSS'] is not displayed
